attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support cheeto🧡 when I opened it it was a picture of cheeto and I was scarred. of course i then exited the app and went into snapchat AND CHEETO WAS THERE AGAIN! i then went to check all my other apps and he was there in EVERY ONE🤬 I was scarred. I now have to go to therapy 5 times a week. Do not download this app it hacks everything with cheeto man😖
